message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but I'm looking to pay a bit less. Would you be willing to accept $8,500 for the product?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high for me.  Would you consider $9,000?
